   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Celsus Documentation
============================================

Celsus simplifies to search in your PDF files. It automatically scans PDF files and build index. It can also to create searchable PDF files from your image based PDF files.

Celsus can also index custom files (like XML, TXT and JSON) which contains meta-data about other files so you can search on meta-data. Celsus seamlessly can index Kyocera meta-data files.

You need to have a registered copy to use Celsus. But don't worry, if you don't have one you can easily get a trial copy.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   
   install/installation
